skills.name: GHA Workflows
skills.pattern: on: [push, pull_request] jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v4

skills.name: GHA Matrix
skills.pattern: strategy: matrix: node: [18, 20] os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest]

skills.name: GHA Secrets
skills.pattern: env: API_KEY: ${{ secrets.API_KEY }}

skills.name: GHA Caching
skills.pattern: - uses: actions/cache@v3 with: path: ~/.npm key: ${{ runner.os }}-node-${{ hashFiles('**/package-lock.json') }}

skills.name: GHA Artifacts
skills.pattern: - uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3 with: name: build path: dist/

skills.name: GitLab Stages
skills.pattern: stages: [build, test, deploy] build-job: stage: build script: npm run build

skills.name: GitLab Rules
skills.pattern: rules: - if: $CI_COMMIT_BRANCH == 'main' - if: $CI_PIPELINE_SOURCE == 'merge_request_event'

skills.name: GitLab Cache
skills.pattern: cache: key: ${CI_COMMIT_REF_SLUG} paths: [node_modules/]

skills.name: ArgoCD Apps
skills.pattern: kind: Application spec: source: repoURL: git@github.com:org/repo path: k8s/

skills.name: ArgoCD Sync
skills.pattern: syncPolicy: automated: prune: true selfHeal: true

skills.name: PromQL Basics
skills.pattern: rate(http_requests_total{status='500'}[5m]) / rate(http_requests_total[5m])

skills.name: Prometheus Alerts
skills.pattern: alert: HighErrorRate expr: rate(errors[5m]) > 0.05 for: 5m labels: severity: critical

skills.name: Prometheus Recording
skills.pattern: record: job:http_requests:rate5m expr: rate(http_requests_total[5m])

skills.name: Grafana Dashboards
skills.pattern: panels: [{type: 'graph', targets: [{expr: 'rate(requests[5m])'}], gridPos: {x:0, y:0, w:12, h:8}}]

skills.name: Grafana Variables
skills.pattern: templating: list: [{name: 'namespace', query: 'label_values(kube_pod_info, namespace)'}]

skills.name: Elasticsearch Index
skills.pattern: logs-{yyyy.MM.dd} avec ILM policy pour rotation

skills.name: Logstash Pipeline
skills.pattern: filter { grok { match => { 'message' => '%{COMBINEDAPACHELOG}' } } }

skills.name: Kibana Discover
skills.pattern: KQL: status:500 AND @timestamp > now-1h

skills.name: Ansible Playbooks
skills.pattern: - hosts: webservers tasks: - name: Install nginx apt: name=nginx state=present

skills.name: Ansible Roles
skills.pattern: roles/nginx/tasks/main.yml, templates/nginx.conf.j2

skills.name: Ansible Vault
skills.pattern: ansible-vault encrypt secrets.yml; ansible-playbook --ask-vault-pass

skills.name: Vault Secrets
skills.pattern: vault kv put secret/myapp/config username=admin password=secret

skills.name: Vault Dynamic
skills.pattern: vault read database/creds/my-role -> temporary DB credentials

skills.name: Vault Policies
skills.pattern: path 'secret/data/myapp/*' { capabilities = ['read'] }

skills.name: DNS Records
skills.pattern: A: IP address. CNAME: alias. MX: mail. TXT: verification

skills.name: SSL/TLS
skills.pattern: Let's Encrypt certbot, cert-manager pour K8s, mTLS pour service mesh

skills.name: Load Balancer Types
skills.pattern: L4: TCP/UDP, fast. L7: HTTP, path routing, SSL termination

skills.name: OCI Images
skills.pattern: buildah, podman, kaniko pour builds rootless/daemonless

skills.name: Container Security
skills.pattern: trivy scan, distroless base, non-root user, read-only fs

skills.name: Container Registries
skills.pattern: Image signing, vulnerability scanning, retention policies
